STAFF INFO
FAQ: Answers for staff
Text version
PDF version
Staff Lunch and Learn: Strategies for Self-Care and Resilience
April 24 or May 1
11 a.m. to 12 p.m.
Register here to watch our webinar live or to see the recording later:
April 24 : Sign Up Here
May 1: Sign Up Here
Managing your own stress is key to helping others during challenging times.
This lunch-and-learn webinar will explore the social and emotional difficulties we face living in isolation because of the COVID-19 pandemic, focusing on the impact on our social and emotional structures. We will also discuss how this pandemic is a type of trauma, what responses we can expect, and why self-care is important as you continue to care for others.
Jamie Wehmeyer, an experienced licensed clinical social worker, is the chief clinical leader for Resilience Builders, LLC., where she provides consultation and training on Trauma-Informed Care and building resilience.
